Control Name: Restores Operations—Procedures are in place to restore data and business operations to an interim state that permits the achievement of entity objectives.

control_attributes.Control: Restores Operations—Procedures are in place to restore data and business operations to an interim state that permits the achievement of entity objectives.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC7.4 The entity responds to identified security incidents by executing a defined incident response program to understand, contain, remediate, and communicate security incidents, as appropriate.
